title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 645-4.5 - Service of papers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 645-4.5 - Service of papers

State Regulations

All notices, papers and intermediate process connected
with a hearing, other than the notice of hearing and complaint or UAC, subpoenas served upon persons who are not a party to the proceeding, and the
order containing the final determination of the commission, may be served by
ordinary mail. Except where otherwise specifically provided, service by
ordinary mail shall be complete when mailed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
645-4.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
